text:
*Read / Write HubSpot with SQL*

Hey HubSpot Devs,

After working with amazing devs in this community, we’re launching our most requested feature: the ability to read and write to HubSpot directly through your database.

You can `SELECT`, `INSERT`, `UPDATE`, and `DELETE` HubSpot records just as you’d expect. It’s synchronous and snappy.

If you’re curious about how it works and the developer experience - <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BgJ8oYo-M4Q&t=2131s)~|watch this demo> we created with the HubSpot DevRel team, or <https://docs.sequin.io/|check out our docs>.

We want to continue to make this product great - and would love to hear any feedback or questions.
